name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Full Stack Engineer with 10+ years of experience skilled in **Python**, **TypeScript**, and developing scalable **APIs**. Expertise in building secure and high-performance **SaaS** solutions on **AWS** while ensuring optimal scalability and user experience. Proficient in modern frameworks including **React**, **Node.js**, and **Next.js**, with a strong focus on performance and security best practices. Adept in leverage of **OAuth** for secure authentication, making solutions compliant and robust.

Seasoned in collaborative environments, excelling in problem-solving and driving integration of technologies such as **Temporal** for effective task scheduling within B2B applications. Brings a wealth of knowledge in microservices architecture and real-time user interaction, ensuring that all solutions meet stringent compliance standards. Passionate about creating impactful systems that truly enhance business functionality.
